Race.SpecificTitle: PW Law Enforcement Dist. -- 10 Mills - Sheriff - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall the Law Enforcement District of the Parish of St. Helena, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a special tax of ten (10) mills on all the property subject to taxation in said District (an estimated $520,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2017 and ending with the year 2026, for the purpose of providing additional funding for the District?

Race.SpecificTitle: Parishwide Proposition -- 3.55 Mills Renewal - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of St. Helena, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), levy a special tax of three and fifty-five hundredths (3.55) mills on all the property subject to taxation within the Parish (an estimated $191,700 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2019 and ending with the year 2028, to acquire, improve, maintain, operate and support Parish Senior Citizens' Centers and to provide funding for Parish Senior Citizens' programs, services and facilities provided, or operated by, the St. Helena Parish Council on Aging?
